entities.name: INTEL
entities.description: Intel is a competitor offering high-end discrete GPUs that may be cheaper or provide better functionality or features than those offered by the subject company.

entities.name: AMD

relationships.relationship_description: Both Intel and AMD are competitors in the high-end discrete GPU market, competing against the subject company with potentially cheaper or more functional products.
